planning: a. If defeated, recover all damage.
b. Move toward a bounty target (character, crew, face-up/face-down contact).
action: Buy a gear card. If unable buy a bounty card, even if at a navpoint.
encounter: a. If negative reputation matching a patrol in this space, encounter that patrol.
b. Encounter a bounty target in this space (character, crew, face-up contact).
c. Roll dice equal to Krrsantan's land attack. For each hit rolled, Krrsantan gains credits 2 000 and suffers 1 damage.
special: Discard top cards from job and luxury market decks. Then shuffle this AI deck.
